abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews The One, dance piece choreographed and performed by Lyndsey Karr, featuring Gina Kohler, at the Chocolate Factory.
snippet: At the Chocolate Factory, the choreographer Lyndsey Karr and Gina Kohler performed “the One,” a dance production about love from a female perspective.
lead_paragraph: At the Chocolate Factory, the choreographer Lyndsey Karr and Gina Kohler performed “the One,” a dance production about love from a female perspective.

headline.main: Women in Love Leap Into Elevator Shafts
headline.print_headline: Women in Love Leap Into Elevator Shafts
headline.seo: Lyndsey Karr’s ‘One’ at Chocolate Factory - Review
